mapper.select: select bno, title, content, nickname, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date, up_date from qna_posts where bno = #{bno}
select bno, title, content, nickname, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date, up_date from qna_posts order by reg_date desc, bno desc
mapper.insert: insert into qna_posts (title, content, nickname) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{nickname})
mapper.delete: delete from qna_posts where bno = #{bno} and nickname = #{nickname}
